using System;
using System.IO;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.Formatting.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;
	public partial class IndentSwitch
	{
		public Task TestAsync(string value, IDisposable item)
		{
			if (value == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException(nameof(value));
			return InternalTestAsync();
			async Task InternalTestAsync()
			{

				await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync());
				switch (item)
				{
					case BinaryReader br:
						value = "test";
						break;
					case Stream _:
						value = "test2";
						break;
					default:
						throw new InvalidOperationException();
				}

				switch (value)
				{
					case "test":
						return;
					default:
						throw new InvalidOperationException();
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
